item.title: Developer Guide
item.description:
1. Document

    • Xmind
      • Module
      • functions
      • test
    • Visio
      • flowchart
      • class diagram
    • PPT
      • system architecture
    • Conflue

  2. Tools

    • JDK
    • IDEA
    • Postman
    • Maven
    • Github
    • Git ….

  3. Tech

    • Spring
    • SpringBoot
    • RPC/ SpringCloud
    • MQ
    • Redis
    • MyBatis
    • Router sharding
      • ShardingSphere
      • Mycat
    • distributed task scheduling framework
      • xxl-job
    • configuration
      • Zookeeper
      • Eureka
      • Nacos
    • Gateway
      • Zuul
      • Netty
    • Load balancer
      • Nginx
      • LVS/F5

  4. Database

    • Mysql
    • Elasticsearch

  5. Deployment

    • delplyment
      • Jenkins
    • load test
      • JMeter
    • log
      • ELK

  6. monitor

    • distributed tracing
      • Zipkin
      • Google Dapper
      • Java: Arthas
    • Monitoring Database
      • LEPUS
